Key Match Events: Salvador Perez attempted to throw out a runner at third base but missed, allowing one run to score.
Alex Verdugo homered to put the Yankees ahead 3-2.
Hunter Renfroe hit a home run to help the Royals grab the lead again.
Austin Wells hit two home runs, one of which was a mammoth home run.
Chris Stratton allowed five baserunners, of which three scored in the bottom of the eighth.
Pre-Game Insights: Bobby Witt Jr. is vying for the American League MVP against Aaron Judge.
Post-Match Reflections: The game starts tomorrow with another crack at the Yankees.
Kansas Cityâ€™s magic number, the number of games which they must win or their competitors must lose, for the third Wild Card slot is 13.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Salvador Perez pops up and Witt somehow scores from first base.
